messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Unshu ju Umeki Harusato
messages.msgSnippet: I ll ask JIm. Rich ... From: Jim Gilbert To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday, November 21, 2003 12:23 PM Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Unshu ju Umeki
messages.messageBody:
I'll ask JIm.

Rich
----- Original Message -----
From: Jim Gilbert
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, November 21, 2003 12:23 PM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Unshu ju Umeki Harusato


Rich,
Can you get the original kanji? Perhaps the reading isn't an accepted one.

Jim



From my message board

Hi all, I thought i would post this here, in the hope that someone may know

Rich T

Hi all, I am looking for an tsuba artist with name "Harusato".The inscription reads "Unshu ju Umeki Harusato".I couldnot find him in either Haynes or Iida/Wakayama "Kinko Jiten".

Ludolf
